XI.i.1.C.1.b
.
Actions  to Take if a Spouse Was Erroneously Paid the MOD Payment
If a month of death (MOD) payment was paid in error because
either
the Veteran is not deceased
or
the MOD payment was not awarded to the appropriate spouse, then establish a debt on the spouse’s record who was paid the benefit in error.
The finance activity will follow the standard debt collection procedures to recoup the erroneous payment.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C  - Errors During Notice of Death (NOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C
